games.title: TB World
games.description:
Discover the fascinating world of the game Toka Life, which will give you a sea of creativity and joy! Here you can bring your fantasies to life, creating stylish images for characters and cozy interiors.

The design process will be a real pleasure: choose from a variety of clothes, accessories and interior items to make each image and space unique. Transform your characters and their surroundings to create a unique atmosphere.

This game is your personal creativity workshop where you create your own story. Start your exciting journey into the world of design today and let your ideas flow, creating unique images and cozy interiors!
games.howToPlayText:
The game opens up endless possibilities for creativity and fun, with your main task being to bring your fantasies to life and create unique stories.

The controls are intuitive and user-friendly, making it perfect for players of all ages. The simple interface allows you to easily move characters, items, and decor by swiping across the screen. You can tap on clothing and accessories to dress up your characters and drag items to decorate interiors.

In TB World, there are no strict rules or fixed storylines. You become the author of your own adventures and stories, using a wide range of scenarios, characters, and items. Your imagination is the only limit in this world of creativity and possibilities!

games.title: Wednesday Addams Merge Drop Puzzle
games.description:
Wednesday Addams Merge Drop Puzzle â€“ The Creepy & Addictive Wednesday Game Online!

Step into the spooky world of Wednesday Addams with Wednesday Ad Merge Drop Puzzle â€“ the ultimate merge-and-drop puzzle challenge inspired by the viral fruit drop trend! Merge creepy items, unlock mysterious evolutions, and see what dark surprises await.

How to play? Drop and merge two identical spooky items to evolve them into bigger and scarier ones. Keep combining until you unlock the final giant mystery object â€“ can you guess what Wednesdayâ€™s darkest creation will be?

Wednesday Ad Merge Drop Puzzle isnâ€™t just fun â€“ itâ€™s creepy-cool and highly addictive. With gothic visuals, smooth animations, and the eerie vibe of Wednesday Addamsâ€™ world, itâ€™s the perfect game for fans of puzzles, spooky aesthetics, and the Wednesday universe.

ðŸ”¹ Free to play online â€“ no download required
ðŸ”¹ Works on any device (PC & mobile)
ðŸ”¹ Creepy new items and evolutions coming soon
ðŸ”¹ Perfect for quick plays or long spooky sessions

Start merging now and see if you can master the darkness in Wednesday Addams Merge Drop Puzzle

games.title: World of Labubu. Life and Creativity
games.description:
Â«World of Labubu. Life and CreativityÂ» is a colorful dress-up and interior design game for fans of creativity and fun. Create your own Labubu by choosing eyes, nose, mouth, colors, outfits, hats and accessories. Each character can be unique and reflect your personal style.

After customizing your hero, explore cozy houses on the map and decorate the interiors. Place furniture, hang paintings, add details and create rooms that match your vision. There are no strict rules here â€” only your imagination and freedom.

If you are a fan of Toca Boca or love creative games where you can dress up characters and design spaces, youâ€™ll feel right at home in Â«World of Labubu. Life and CreativityÂ». Experiment, express yourself and build your own stories!
games.howToPlayText:
In Â«World of Labubu. Life and CreativityÂ» everything is simple:

1. Create your Labubu â€” choose eyes, nose, mouth, colors and style.

2. Pick outfits, hats and accessories to highlight your characterâ€™s look.

3. Enter the houses on the map and start interior decorating.

4. Arrange furniture, hang paintings, add details and make rooms cozy.

Controls: use your mouse to select and place items. Fans of creative games like Toca Boca will quickly feel at home â€” just experiment and create your own unique worlds!

This fun dress-up game lets you spin the wheel to unlock school uniforms from countries like Japan, the U.S., the U.K., India, France, and South Korea. Customize your character with stylish outfits, accessories, and hairstyles inspired by each culture. Dive into the diversity of school uniforms and become a fashion expert while having fun!
games.howToPlayText:
Explore global fashion in Back to School: Uniforms Edition! This fun dress-up game lets you spin the wheel to unlock school uniforms from countries like Japan, the U.S., the U.K., India, France, and South Korea. games.title: Movie Star Daily Routine
games.description: Let's join the a day in the life of a movie star stream. We will spend the whole day with a famous actress from the series. The morning begins with cosmetic procedures and skin care. See how the skin of a movie star shines! Time to go in for sports to maintain excellent physical shape. Preparing for going to the gym begins with packing a bag - you need to take water, a yoga mat and other accessories. A star needs to look stylish even in the gym, so you need to get serious about choosing a tracksuit. It's time to put on your makeup and go to the screen test. The movie star will have to go through a casting and try on the image of the heroines of films and series. And finally, it's time to enjoy the glory. Having collected everything you need in a small clutch, the girl goes to the red carpet to amaze everyone with brilliant and original outfits!
games.howToPlayText: Depending on the gaming device, a computer mouse click or a simple touch on touchscreens is used to control it. The result can be saved as a PNG image.

games.title: Check Wednesday Phone!
games.description:
Check Wednesday Phone! creepy-cute game inspired by the Netflix series. Read messages, solve mysteries, explore Nevermoreâ€™s secrets and play gothic miniâ€‘games.

Enter Wednesday Addams' digital world in this dark, twisted game. Check emails from Nevermore students, change your gothic phone theme, play eerie miniâ€‘games, and explore her secret-filled dorm. Earn coins doing tasks Wednesday would probably mock â€” but youâ€™ll need them to unlock the next mystery.
games.howToPlayText: Tap Wednesdayâ€™s phone to begin. Read cryptic emails, change to delightfully gloomy wallpapers, earn coins, and explore her eerie room. Click on strange objects, crack passwords, and uncover secrets hidden in Nevermore. Watch for new messagesâ€”they guide the story.

games.title: Sort And Style: Back To School
games.description: Step into the world of Sort And Style: Back To School, a fun mix of sorting and dress-up games for girls! Organize messy desks, lockers, wardrobes, and even bento boxes across 9 exciting levels. Then, challenge your creativity in the final dress-up unit where you style your school look with trendy uniforms, shoes, hairstyles, and accessories. Perfect for fans of organizing games, makeover fun, and school fashion challenges!
games.howToPlayText:
1. Choose a Unit â€“ Start with cluttered spaces like study desks, lockers, or wardrobes.
2. Sort Items â€“ Drag and drop objects into the right place, category, or design.
3. Unlock Levels â€“ Complete organizing tasks to move to the next challenge.
4. Dress Up Fun â€“ In the final unit, pick school uniforms, shoes, bags, hairstyles, and accessories to create your perfect back-to-school style.

games.description: A young bestie goes to school to learn magic and make new friends. She has her own special style. The girl prefers black colors in clothes and a gothic look. Her roommate likes bright colors in her clothes. It will not be easy for new acquaintances to find a common language. However, this bright girl is not as simple as it seems at first glance. She has her secrets. Try to choose for each student an image that suits her perfectly. And one day these besties will be BFF.

Help the girls create their own unique image: choose make up, hairstyles, outfits and accessories, that match the characters of the girls. And, perhaps, they will eventually become best friends. games.description:
Â«Brainrots: Dress Up & Interior DesignÂ» is a bright dress-up and interior design game where everyone can show creativity. Six popular heroes are waiting for you: Cappuccino Assassino, Ballerina Cappuccina, Bombardiro Crocodilo, Orcalero, Chimpanzini Bananini and Tralalelo Tralalata. Each character is unique, and you can create their own style: choose outfits, hats and accessories, mix looks and invent fashionable combinations.

Then move on to interior design! Decorate rooms with furniture, hang paintings, add cozy details and create spaces to your taste. There are no limits or restrictions â€” only your imagination and freedom of expression.

If you enjoy creative games like Toca Boca, where you can dress up characters and design rooms, Â«Brainrots: Dress Up & Interior DesignÂ» is the perfect choice. Experiment, create stories and bring your ideas to life!
games.howToPlayText:
In Â«Brainrots: Dress Up & Interior DesignÂ», itâ€™s easy to start:

1. Choose a character from six available heroes.

2. Pick outfits, hats and accessories to highlight the style.

3. Decorate the room interior: arrange furniture, paintings and details.

4. Combine styles, imagine stories and create unique designs.

Controls: use the mouse to select and place items. The game is simple, fun and quickly pulls you into the creative process.
